sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
St. Clair Land Cession Act.

sections.heading: Jurisdiction over the following described land in the County of
sections.text: St. Clair, State of Illinois, is hereby ceded to the United States of America:

sections.heading: Over that part of the North Half of the South Half of Section 15,
sections.text:
Township One (1) North, Range 7 West of the Third Principal Meridian, more
particularly described as follows:
